code: import React from'react';import{Bar,Pie}from'react-chartjs-2';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Chart=_ref=>{let{data,title,type}=_ref;const[selectedItem,setSelectedItem]=useState(null);const chartData={labels:data.map(item=>item.make),datasets:[{label:'Average Consumption',backgroundColor:'rgba(75,192,192,0.2)',borderColor:'rgba(75,192,192,1)',borderWidth:1,hoverBackgroundColor:'rgba(75,192,192,0.4)',hoverBorderColor:'rgba(75,192,192,1)',data:data.map(item=>item.avg_cons)}]};const ChartComponent=type==='pie'?Pie:Bar;const options={scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true}},onClick:(event,elements)=>{if(elements.length>0){const index=elements[0].index;alert("You clicked on ".concat(data[index].make));}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Average Consumption by Make"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:chartData})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:chartData,options:options}),selectedItem&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"detail-view"})]});};export default Chart;
